description:
Detect available subtitles for videos and offer options to download them separately (as SRT/VTT files) or embed them directly into the video file. Support multiple languages when available.

**Rationale:** Accessibility and language learning are common use cases. Many videos have valuable subtitle tracks that users want to preserve, especially for educational content or foreign language videos.
title: Subtitle/closed caption download and embedding
